response: "{ \"title\": \"Maximum Sum of Subarray (Hard)\", \"description\": \"Given a list of integers, write a function that returns the maximum sum of any subarray within the array.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the maximum sum of any subarray within the input array.\\n\", \"code\": \"import copy\\n\\ndef max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int]) -> int:\\n    if len(arr) == 1:\\n        return arr[0]\\n    max_sum = float('-inf')\\n    for i in range(len(arr)):\\n        current_sum = 0\\n        for j in range(i, len(arr)):\\n            current_sum += arr[j]\\n            max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)\\n    return max_sum\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert max_sum_subarray([-2,1,-3,4,-1,2,1,-5,4]) == 6\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([1,-2,3,10,9,-7,15,-24,-13]) == 23\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([0,0,0,0,0]) == 0\"] }"
